General.Name: HLscience Co. Ltd
General.Description: HLscience Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and sale of cosmetics, health functional foods, quasi-drugs, and health-oriented foods in South Korea. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Hwaseong-si, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Sok-Hun  Kang
1.Title: Chief Fin. Officer, Managing Director and Director

2.Name: Dong-Ryul  Lee
2.Title: Sr. Managing Director of Management Support and Director
